name: Mini-Golf Prototype
description:
Aim of the game: Shoot your golf ball into the hole in the least amount of strokes possible!

Mini-Golf Prototype is a small development project that was a task for Unity Learning. Took me a little over a week to complete and I have learnt much during this process.

The feedback for this prototype will be appreciated and will help improve my development skills in future projects. Thank you for your time!
